attributes.action: Stop the councils charging to investigate high hedge complaints
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When you have a problem with a high hedge why should you have to pay for the council to investigate the complaint. I would agree if you have made a complaint unfounded you should pay for the wasted time. If it is found in your favor then the other party should pay £350 is a lot to pay when your on low income. If you live in a council property as usual it is all free. Is this fee ment to put people off making a complaint
